sentence: …parliamentarians, clerks, and Senator's prowess,      To the Pages and doorkeepers whose faces beam.      In the Senate no one engages in Churlishness,       Because then they would break Rule XIX.      The Senate has been living for centuries,      Alive by following our framers' themes.                                By Hunter Coy       Sun rises on the Capitol dome…
